headline: About me
title: Passionate
text: When I started 10 years ago as a Junior Front-End Developer, it was the beginning of HTML5, CSS3 and Responsive Websites.
Now, we can do a lot more. We have Modern CSS, Modern JS (ES5+), JS Frameworks to build Web and Mobile Apps.
Ten years later, I still love what I do: coding. I keep learning day by day new tools, solutions, frameworks and even Back-End Development.
